key.name: next-layout
key.description: Select the next layout on the current monitor and workspace.

key.name: previous-layout
key.description: Select the previous layout on the current monitor and workspace.

key.name: layout-horizontal
key.description: Change the layout of the current monitor and workspace to horizontal.

key.name: layout-vertical
key.description: Change the layout of the current monitor and workspace to vertical.

key.name: layout-floating
key.description: Change the layout of the current monitor and workspace to floating.

key.name: layout-maximized
key.description: Change the layout of the current monitor and workspace to maximized.

key.name: next-window
key.description: Select the next window on the current screen and workspace.

key.name: previous-window
key.description: Select the previous window on the current screen and workspace.

key.name: swap-with-next-window
key.description: Switch the current client with the next client in a layout.

key.name: swap-with-previous-window
key.description: Switch the current client with the previous client in a layout.

key.name: next-monitor
key.description: Select the topmost window on the next screen and current workspace.

key.name: previous-monitor
key.description: Select the topmost window on the previous screen and current workspace.

key.name: move-to-next-monitor-alt
key.summary: Move the current window to the next monitor
key.description: Move the current focused window to the next monitor on the current workspace.

key.name: move-to-next-monitor
key.summary: Move the current window to the next monitor
key.description: Move the current focused window to the next monitor on the current workspace.

key.name: move-to-previous-monitor
key.summary: Move the current window to the previous monitor
key.description: Move the current focused window to the previous monitor on the current workspace.

key.name: increase-master-area
key.description: Move the split position of master clients to increase the master window area by 5%.

key.name: decrease-master-area
key.description: Move the split position of master clients to decrease the master window area by 5%.

key.name: increase-n-master
key.summary: Increase the number of master windows.
key.description: Increase the number of splits in the master area.

key.name: decrease-n-master
key.summary: Decrease the number of master windows.
key.description: Decrease the number of splits in the master area.

key.name: swap-window-with-master
key.summary: Swap the current window with the master.
key.description: Swaps the current window with the master. The number of master windows will be set to one.

key.name: set-workspace-1
key.description: Select the workspace with id 1.

key.name: set-workspace-2
key.description: Select the workspace with id 2.

key.name: set-workspace-3
key.description: Select the workspace with id 3.

key.name: set-workspace-4
key.description: Select the workspace with id 4.

key.name: set-workspace-5
key.description: Select the workspace with id 5.

key.name: set-workspace-6
key.description: Select the workspace with id 6.

key.name: set-workspace-7
key.description: Select the workspace with id 7.

key.name: set-workspace-8
key.description: Select the workspace with id 8.

key.name: set-workspace-9
key.description: Select the workspace with id 9.

key.name: set-workspace-10
key.description: Select the workspace with id 10.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-1
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 1.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-2
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 2.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-3
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 3.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-4
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 4.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-5
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 5.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-6
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 6.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-7
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 7.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-8
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 8.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-9
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 9.

key.name: move-window-to-workspace-10
key.description: Move the current window to the workspace with id 10.

key.name: window-toggle-maximize
key.description: Toggle maximize of the current window.

key.name: window-toggle-fullscreen
key.description: Toggle fullscreen of the current window.

key.name: window-toggle-floating
key.description: Toggle floating of the current window.

key.name: launch-terminal
key.description: Launches a gnome terminal.
